mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ELEMENTS LEFT JOIN SET_VS_ELEMENT ON CID = ELEMENTS.ID WHERE (ELEMENTS.METADATA_IDENTIFY=#{keyword} or ELEMENTS.METADATA_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND FID = #{datasetID} AND CTYPE =2
SELECT STANDARD AS FLAG ,COUNT(METADATA_IDENTIFY) AS TOTAL FROM ELEMENTS GROUP BY STANDARD
SELECT STATUS AS FLAG ,COUNT(METADATA_IDENTIFY) AS TOTAL FROM ELEMENTS GROUP BY `STATUS`
